synopsis.text: Will the beloved idols of PriPara be able to conquer the cosmos in their historic first 'Puchuu Tour'? Embarking on an interplanetary journey, Laala and her friends set out to share the magic and joy of PriPara with the rest of the solar system. As they explore new worlds and uncover hidden wonders, the idols face unexpected trials and tribulations that put their skills and unity to the test. Will they be able to overcome the challenges and return safely to Earth, or are they in for a cosmic surprise? Join the PriPara idols on their exciting space adventure and witness the power of friendship and music in this thrilling anime!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
